title: Game Theory: Spiderman DESTROYED New York! (Spider-Man: Miles Morales)
author: The Game Theorists
description:
Special thanks to NordVPN for sponsoring this episode!
Get a 2 Year Plan + an extra 1 month FREE w/ code MATPAT ► https://NordVPN.com/matpat 
It’s risk free with Nord’s 30 day money-back guarantee!

*Correction - Dr. Vijay Modi is a Professor of Mechanical Engineering at Columbia University

Theorists, we are here to talk about the ending of Spider-Man: Miles Morales. That is your warning. You see, at the end of the game Miles absorbs the giant blast meant to destroy his city and released it high above the skyline in order to keep people from being hurt. Well Miles, there is a slight problem with your solution. Miles, I am sorry to tell you that you did NOT save the city. Why? Watch to find out!

Find the game here ► https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/marvels-spider-man-miles-morales/

Get yourself some Theory Wear! ► https://bit.ly/2UkxCv0

理論家們，我們在這裏討論的是“蜘蛛俠：邁爾斯·莫拉萊斯”的結局。這是你的警告。你看，在遊戲結束時，邁爾斯吸收了本應摧毀他的城市的巨大爆炸，並將其釋放到天際線上方，以防止人們受傷。邁爾斯，你的解決方案有個小問題。邁爾斯，我很抱歉地告訴你，你沒有拯救這座城市。爲什麼？等着瞧吧！
